Token_t Struct Reference


Data Fields

string TokenValue
long LineNumber
TokenType Type

Detailed Description

Definition of a token scanned from the input file. This is the representation used throughout the rest of the front-end for dealing with tokens.

Field Documentation

string Token_t::TokenValue

The value as appeared in the source code.

long Token_t::LineNumber

Line number the token appeared on.

TokenType Token_t::Type

What type of token this is.
